posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.80 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • This might be your type of update if you’ve been experiencing typing bugs with your third-party keyboard on iOS 26.

In addition, with this release we’re continuing our TestFlight-exclusive testing of Backups. See the 7.79 release post for more details: https://community.signalusers.org/t/beta-feedback-for-the-upcoming-ios-7-79-release.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter! We’ve also made improvements to the Backup Settings view, as well as to the flow for enabling Backups; if you’d like to try those out, please disable Backups and re-enable it.

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you’re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.79 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.80.0.1067-beta

56 new commits since 7.79.0.1054-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.80 [1]

  • Drop backcompat link'n'sync capability [2]

  • Fix "read" state for incoming messages with edits during Backup restore [3]

  • Better handle incorrect AEP during quick/manual restore [4]

  • Fix expanding conversation settings on iOS 26 [5]

  • Improve handling of large text in registration flow [6]

  • Protect against very old dates in link previews [7]

  • Use animation clock for spoiler animations [8]

  • Snapshot chat list download banner byte count for 'Complete' state [9]

  • Remove unnecessary parameters from sendSenderKeyCiphertext [10]

  • Only register the Backup public key once [11]

  • Avoid file copy on upload resume [12]

  • Account for interactiveContentPopGestureRecognizer during registration [13]

  • Account for horizontal safe area in toasts [14]

  • Tweak action sheet styles [15]

  • Remove unneeded username field in account entropy pool [16]

  • Add log line when Backup uploads finish [17]

  • Run schema migrations before creating globals [18]

  • Load remote config before initializing globals [19]

  • Pass remote config to libsignal [20]

  • Pass remote config to libsignal when it changes [21]

  • Pass remote config to ringrtc [22]

  • Move some files to more appropriate directories [23]

  • Gate receive behind a FF [24]

  • Fix crash presenting username education screen. [25]

  • Fix ensureLocalDeviceId migration [26]

  • Remove hack that’s no longer necessary [27]

  • Fix instances where super.viewDidLoad wasn't called. [28]

  • Polls polish [29]

  • Update corner radius for media thumbnails in conversation settings [30]

  • Re-worked custom chat keyboard size calculations. […] [31]

  • Fix nav bar title colors not responding to theme changes [32]

  • Grab bag of Backups style fixes [33]

  • Add toast when tapping 'Not Now' during Backups onboarding [34]

  • Add confirmation before downgrading paid -> free Backups [35]

  • Wait until app is ready to handle push tokens [36]

  • Remove unnecessary keyboard frame tracking from "Contact Us". […] [37]

  • Set up WebP globals a single time [38]

  • Send end poll messages [39]

  • Layout tweaks to Backup Settings [40]

  • Exclude "new" attachments from media Backup progress [41]

  • Fix crash when viewing all group members [42]

  • Fix split view on iOS 26 [43]

  • Throw SVRB cancellation errors as CancellationError [44]

  • Update SwiftProtobuf to 1.31.1 [45]

  • Update call row subtitle icons [46]

  • Cancel manual backups before attempting to disable Backups [47]

  • Reset cellular Backup downloads if we get WiFi [48]

  • Allow pausing the backups upload queue [49]

  • Update fastlane deliver options [50]

  • Update release notes [51]

  • Update translations [52]

  • Revert "Fix Xcode 26 builds on CI" [53]

  • Revert "Switch to Xcode 26.0" [54]

  • Workaround for dysfunctional UIKeyboardLayoutGuide on iOS 15. […] [55]

  • Return early it unexpected upload size encountered [56]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.79.0.1054-beta…7.80.0.1067-beta

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Posted an edit. My original post had suggested that disabling/re-enabling repeatedly would run into rate limits, which is not accurate. Using the “Create New [Recovery] Key” feature repeatedly may run into rate limits, but not disabling/re-enabling with the same Recovery Key.

posts.name: Jacek K
posts.cooked: Also, just one remark, backups aren’t really as hassle free as in WhatsApp, every single day I get the yellow indicator badge next to my profile picture, about backup failing, due to me having low power mode on, and even sometimes I get this twice a day, which is kind of annoying, just a suggestion, maybe when backup fails, retry, wait a day or two and only then notify the user?

The “change plan” button isn’t localised in version 7.80 (1067):

IMG_1450828×1792 116 KB

I’ve had the app crashing on launch too

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.80.0/671d06eaed027cee9877d4059a3a7aa827e28fa9eaa8559ef6592a20a4719b57.zip

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Thanks for this feedback. The “Backup Failed” prompt is fairly aggressive, and we’re looking into fine-tuning it!

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Hi, are you able to submit .ips crash files? Instructions can be found here.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Thanks for reporting. Since this is a recently-introduced string, it hasn’t yet been localized; it will be before we go to the App Store.
https://gofile.io/d/OzpW2k

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Sorry about this. It’ll be fixed in the beta coming later today.

Backups page yet again doesn’t have any contrast. Also when open app after sometimes a loading indicator shows up like split second. I don’t know why it shows up or how to capture it.

posts.name: tadhglewis
posts.cooked:
I migrated from an Android phone to iPhone and it worked pretty seamlessly however there’s three corrupted Call Links that are stuck forever in the Calls tab.

  1. When I try swiping to delete, nothing happens.
  2. When I try join the call link, it says “Network Error” “Could not join call. Check your internet connection and try again”

Skimming the logs, I can see there’s 404 errors so I assume the call links were actually deleted but are somehow in a corrupted state on-device.

It’s pretty annoying as they’re always at the top of the call list even though there’s more recent calls. Any ideas? Would restoring from backup again fix this?

signal-2025-10-08-1501461320×1196 66.1 KB

When viewing the signal call link there’s no “Delete Link”, “Edit Call Name” or “Require Admin Approval” like there usually is:

IMG_15651320×2868 124 KB

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.80.0/78b95032bfc85ad9be1080c67cce4bf3c2cc9b021ceb23179d985288a4d1ef99.zip

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.84 release

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Thanks for reporting. We’re reproducing this when “enhance contrast” is enabled system-wide, we’ll look into it.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Thanks for reporting. This sounds like a known issue restoring Call Links from Backups – sorry about that. We’re looking into it.
Oh, you’re right. I disabled the setting and it looks fine.

I’m still being rate limited for renabling backups after 6 days and 3 days since trying again I’m assuming the rate limit is maybe a week so will try tomorrow on Friday but just wanted to post a debug log just in case this is unexpected.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.80.0/9a9bd6c271e1d26fb5240cc57579922fd1779f481cac3ed5b9bcac59aaa04fa8.zip

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.81 release.
